statements: SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, date, spend, revenue, roi FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE roi > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT campaign_id, revenue, roi FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE spend >= 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_id, spend, revenue FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, date, spend, revenue, roi FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ad_id, date, spend, revenue, roi, campaign_id FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT date, campaign_id, roi, revenue, spend, ad_id FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE roi > 1.5 AND spend < 1000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT spend, roi, ad_id, revenue, campaign_id, date FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE spend + revenue > 500 AND roi < 2.0 ORDER BY ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, spend, revenue, campaign_id, date, roi FROM ad_spend_roi_metrics WHERE campaign_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_spend;
SELECT ad_campaign, spend_amount FROM ad_spend WHERE ad_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT ad_campaign, spend_amount FROM ad_spend ORDER BY spend_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_campaign, spend_amount, ad_date FROM ad_spend WHERE ad_campaign LIKE '%social%';
SELECT ad_campaign, clicks, conversions, revenue, roi FROM roi_metrics WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend WHERE ad_campaign = 'Spring Sale' AND spend_amount > 1000 ORDER BY spend_amount DESC
SELECT ad_id, ad_date, spend_amount FROM ad_spend WHERE ad_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT ad_id, ad_campaign, revenue FROM ad_spend JOIN roi_metrics ON ad_spend.ad_id = roi_metrics.ad_id WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT ad_id, clicks, roi FROM roi_metrics WHERE clicks > 50 AND roi > 5 ORDER BY clicks ASC
SELECT ad_campaign, ad_date, revenue FROM ad_spend LEFT JOIN roi_metrics ON ad_spend.ad_id = roi_metrics.ad_id WHERE revenue > 5000
SELECT ad_id, spend FROM ad_spend;
SELECT ad_id, revenue, impressions FROM roi_metrics WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, budget, allocated_date FROM budget_allocation WHERE budget > 500;
SELECT date, ad_id, spend FROM ad_spend ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions, revenue FROM roi_metrics WHERE impressions > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_id, spend FROM ad_spend WHERE spend > 1000 ORDER BY ad_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend WHERE date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT ad_id, revenue, impressions, clicks FROM roi_metrics WHERE impressions > 500 AND clicks > 200 ORDER BY revenue DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, spend FROM ad_spend JOIN budget_allocation ON ad_spend.campaign_id = budget_allocation.campaign_id WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY spend ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend JOIN roi_metrics ON ad_spend.ad_id = roi_metrics.ad_id ORDER BY clicks DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend;
SELECT ad_id, amount FROM ad_spend ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM ad_spend GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT ad_id, date FROM ad_spend WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, date FROM ad_spend WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_spend ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_id, MAX(amount) FROM ad_spend GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, SUM(ad_cost) AS total_cost FROM ppc_advertising GROUP BY ad_name, ad_type;
SELECT * FROM roi_metrics WHERE revenue > 1000 AND clicks > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM ad_spend_metrics WHERE spend > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_spend_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT id, campaign_id, clicks FROM roi_metrics WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_group_id, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM ad_spend_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 'c23c1692-6e89-4e95-bf9c-8d7e404b7a1a';
SELECT ad_group_id, sum(spend) as total_spend FROM ad_spend_metrics GROUP BY ad_group_id ORDER BY total_spend DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, count(*) as total_records FROM ad_spend_metrics WHERE impressions > 1000 GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_records > 5;
SELECT ad_group_id, AVG(clicks) as average_clicks FROM ad_spend_metrics WHERE spend > 500 GROUP BY ad_group_id HAVING average_clicks > 10;
SELECT ad_group_id, campaign_id, sum(spend) as total_spend, AVG(impressions) as avg_impressions FROM ad_spend_metrics GROUP BY ad_group_id, campaign_id ORDER BY total_spend DESC, avg_impressions ASC;
